text: On http://poi.apache.org/guidelines.html in section "checklist before submitting a patch" the link to "coding standards" is broken (404 not found).
creator: martin.andersson@purplescout.se

text: Minimal Coding Standards at http://poi.apache.org/resolutions/res001.html is missing again (linked to by http://poi.apache.org/guidelines.html#CodeStyle).
creator: onealj@apache.org
apache@gagravarr.org
text: Ah, needed a relative link, not an absolute one to get generated. Fixed again in r1617744.
